name: Coastal Village
description: Nestled along the shimmering embrace of the Mediterranean coast, the Coastal Village offers a refuge amidst the tumultuous Crusader campaign. Wooden piers extend into azure waters, where fishing boats sway in tandem with the gentle waves. Whitewashed stone cottages huddle together, their thatched roofs crowned by plumes of smoke. Weathered faces, etched by both time and toil, greet weary Crusaders with cautious curiosity. The village exudes an air of weary resilience, caught between the crossroads of war and the tranquil cadence of daily life.

matches.name: Trade at the Marketplace
matches.description: Gather Food and Water at the Marketplace.

matches.name: Recruitment
matches.description: Invoke the divine and explore the village, rallying local supporters to join the Crusader cause.

matches.name: Barter with Fishermen
matches.description: Visit the fishermen along the coast and engage in bartering.

matches.name: Aid the Sick
matches.description: Offer solace and care to the ailing villagers, earning their gratitude.

matches.name: Diplomatic Exchange
matches.description: Engage in diplomatic conversations with village leaders to secure support.
